name: Alliterator
tagline: take a sentence and a character, and try to alliterate it
body:
### Welcome to Alliterator
a program for creating alliteration in sentences

todo: currently neglects pos tagging for choosing a synonym, fix this

### Support or Contact
Having trouble? Gt some some ideas for the project? Just leave feedback at [https://github.com/bean5/alliterator/issues/new](https://github.com/bean5/alliterator/issues/new)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
